Finalize build log with summary

dot-log_build_finalize.Rd

Finalize build log with summary

Usage

.log_build_finalize(log_file, success = TRUE, start_time = NULL)

Arguments

log_file

Character. Path to log file.

success

Logical. Whether build succeeded.

start_time

POSIXct. Build start time.
